title: If I want to be a K-pop trainee and my parents don't approve, can I still audition? - Quora

response.answer_text: first you gotta pass the auditions and your parents have to approve if you pass the 2nd and 3rd audition this is not really my area to talk in but my parents approve and don’t approve cause they still want me to go to school but I do my auditions privately and if I do make it to the second audition I would tell me parents how this could be a great opportunity

If you are underage, then you will have to get your parents approval because if you make it to the final round and get to sign a contract, if you’re underage, then your parents have to approve first or you will not be allowed to sign for it. If you aren’t underage, if that’s your dream, go ahead.
